DOWNLOAD STB HEADERS

These are header-only libraries from https://github.com/nothings/stb

Required files:
1. stb_image.h - Image loading (JPEG, PNG)
2. stb_image_resize2.h - Image resizing

Download:
cd vendor/stb
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nothings/stb/master/stb_image.h
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nothings/stb/master/stb_image_resize2.h

Public domain - no licensing issues.
